name: Dungeon v016
description:
Press "E" to start casting:

1 1 1 1- Fire Style

2 2 2 2 - Ice Style

3 3 3 3 - Light style

4 4 4 4 - Dark style

Style changes both left and right mouse attack

Q - use health potion/previous item in shop
E - next item in shop
left mouse click in shop:
targeting empty place - place item
targeting the counter - fullfil order

middle mouse click - change cam mode

I - open inventory

F - pickup item

Tab - toggle cursor lock

L - restart game

All constructive feedback is welcomed.
